name: "Charlie Wants An Abortion" Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which one of the gang quotes the Bible?
questions.explanation:
Mac.

	The episode originally aired on 11 August 2005. Although Mac can quote the passage, he doesn't know the Bible's stance on blood tests. According to Mac, the passage is from the second book of Genesis, where God breathed life into Adam. Mac was played by Rob McElhenney.

A toy.

	Charlie's ex-girlfriend calls him to tell him that he's a father, and Charlie begins to spend time with the incorrigible brat. Tommy, the child, demands that Charlie buy him a toy or else he'll tell his mother that Charlie took him to "a black person's house."

questions.text: Why does Mac have a list?
options: To keep track of the day's chores
To write down successful ways to woo women
To list what he needs from the grocery store
questions.explanation:
To impress women.

	At a pro-life rally, Mac presents a list to his newfound friend Megan, saying that it is a list of abortion-providing doctors that he's going to kill, with the first two names already crossed off. Megan was played by Autumn Reeser.

False.

	Tommy's real dad is Jimmy Doyle, a no-good idler who went to high school with Charlie and who had recently skipped out on his son. Jimmy Doyle was played by Cormac Bluestone.

questions.text: Why does Dennis go from the pro-choice rally to the pro-life rally?
questions.correct: The pro-life rally has more women
options: The pro-life rally is closer to the restrooms
He changed his stance on the issue
questions.explanation:
The pro-life rally has more women.

	Dennis, being of few convictions, goes to the pro-choice rally with Dee only to meet and sleep with attractive women. When he finds that many of the women are not interested in him, he decides to go over to the pro-life rally and try his luck there. Dennis was played by Glenn Howerton.

questions.text: Charlie is nearing thirty according to which character?
questions.explanation:
Dee.

	"You're ugly!""YOU'RE ugly!""No, YOU'RE ugly!""YOU ARE THE ONE THAT IS UGLY!" Charlie and his supposed son Tommy go back and forth until Dee tells him to grow up. Dee was played by Kaitlin Olson.

True.

	After sleeping together, Megan tells Mac that she's pregnant. Mac freaks out and demands that she get an abortion, despite being rabidly pro-life at the rally. Megan explains that she was testing him and that she's not pregnant, and Mac is exposed as a liar.

questions.text: Charlie tells the waitress that he is Tommy's what?
questions.explanation:
Big brother.

	Charlie has had a crush on the waitress for a long time, and when he sees that she is involved in the Big Brothers/Big Sisters program, he passes himself off as Tommy's Big Brother. This blows up in his face when the waitress finds him yelling at Tommy for getting drunk at the bar.

questions.text: What will Charlie do if he is Tommy's real father?
questions.explanation:
Kill himself.

	Charlie turns out not to be the real father, but if he were, I bet he wouldn't win any parenting awards! Charlie also says that he wishes he could go back in time and force his then-girlfriend to have an abortion.

questions.text: What will Charlie smash Tommy's face into?
questions.explanation:
A jelly.

	When Charlie asks Tommy to be good in a polite fashion, Tommy spits in his face, to which an enraged Charlie replies "I will smash your face into a-a JELLY!" Spencer Daniels played the bad-tempered Tommy.
